# gain

**Instance Property**

The overall level for all sounds emitted from an entity.

## Declaration

```swift
var gain: Audio.Decibel
```

## Discussion

In relative Decibels, in the range  `-.infinity ... .zero` where `.zero` is the default.
title: gain
